arts.ttl: Juventus manager Thiago Motta: “Not easy to score against such a closed team”
arts.sum: Juventus secured a 1-0 victory against Lazio thanks to an own goal by Gila in the closing stages of the match. It was a complex game for the Bianconeri, who despite having a numerical advantage, struggled to find the winning goal. After the match, Juventus manager Thiago Motta spoke to Sky Sport. “We will continue to work on everything,” Motta began. “We faced a team that defended very well, it wasn’t easy. At times, the players were a bit frantic: it’s better to create one good chance than five for nothing. The goal came at the right moment, but it’s The post Juventus manager Thiago Motta: “Not easy to score against such a closed team” appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Lazio Coach Baroni praises team’s performance despite loss to Juventus
arts.sum: Lazio manager Marco Baroni expressed satisfaction with his team’s performance despite a 1-0 loss to Juventus in their Serie A matchup. Speaking to Sky Sport after the game, Baroni highlighted the positive aspects of Lazio’s play, even as they faced adversity. “We put in an excellent performance,” Baroni began. “Going down to 10 men certainly affected us, but I liked what I saw from the team. We’re disappointed with the result, but the performance showed great personality and cohesion.” The coach praised left-back Nuno Tavares for his impact, noting: “Nuno Tavares gave us energy and allows us to push the The post Lazio Coach Baroni praises team’s performance despite loss to Juventus appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Gila’s Own-Goal Spoils Valiant Lazio Showing Against Juventus
arts.sum: Lazio’s four-match winning streak came to an end in a cruel fashion at the hands of Juventus in an eventful evening in Turin that included an early red card and a late own-goal.
